author: Anonymous Comp
title: Missed first lab session due to not being registered
question: Hi, I was apparently unregistered for a lab section and I quickly added one after realizing my mistake just now. I wanted to ask if there was any way I could view the previous lab, or if I could be aware of anything that I missed. Sorry for the inconvenience, bit disorganized since the start of this year from having covid : (
student_answer: Hey sorry to hear about this, you can access the lab content from edx and go through the tasks described there which is what we did in lab this week.
